languages.text: [Кровожадно улыбнуться] "Продолжайте служить мне, танцоры смерти. Но отныне лейте кровь с именем моим на устах!"
[Give a bloodthirsty smile] "Continue to serve me, dancers of death. But henceforth, let my name be upon your lips when you shed blood!"
languages.original_text: [Кровожадно улыбнуться] "Продолжайте служить мне, танцоры смерти. Но отныне лейте кровь с именем моим на устах!"

traits.locale_text: [Smile a bloodthirsty smile] "Carry on serving me, death dancers. But henceforth, let my name be upon your lips as you shed blood!"
[Smile a bloodthirsty smile] "Carry on serving me, death dancers. But henceforth, let my name be upon your lips as you shed blood!"
[Give a bloodthirsty smile] "Continue to serve me, dancers of death. But henceforth, let my name be upon your lips when you shed blood!"
[Give a bloodthirsty smile] "Continue to serve me, dancers of death. But henceforth, let my name be upon your lips when you shed blood!"
[Give a bloodthirsty smile] "Continue to serve me, dancers of death. But henceforth, let my name be upon your lips when you shed blood!"
[Give a bloodthirsty smile] "Continue to serve me, dancers of death. But henceforth, let my name be upon your lips when you shed blood!"

languages.text: [Afficher un sourire sanguinaire] « Continuez à me servir, danseurs de la mort. Mais dorénavant, que mon nom soit sur vos lèvres lorsque vous répandez le sang ! »
languages.original_text: [Give a bloodthirsty smile] "Continue to serve me, dancers of death. But henceforth, let my name be upon your lips when you shed blood!"

traits.locale_text: [Afficher un sourire sanguinaire] « Continuez à me servir, danseurs de la mort. Mais dorénavant, que mon nom soit sur vos lèvres lorsque vous répandez le sang ! »

languages.text: [Mostrarle una sonrisa sanguinaria] «Continúen sirviéndome, bailarines de la muerte. Pero, a partir de ahora, ¡cuando derramen sangre, que sea con mi nombre en sus labios!».
languages.original_text: [Give a bloodthirsty smile] "Continue to serve me, dancers of death. But henceforth, let my name be upon your lips when you shed blood!"

traits.locale_text: [Mostrarle una sonrisa sanguinaria] «Continúen sirviéndome, bailarines de la muerte. Pero, a partir de ahora, ¡cuando derramen sangre, que sea con mi nombre en sus labios!».

languages.text: [露出嗜血的微笑]“继续为我服务吧，死亡的舞者们。不过从今以后，每当你们挥洒鲜血的时候，要记得颂唱我的名字！”
languages.original_text: [Give a bloodthirsty smile] "Continue to serve me, dancers of death. But henceforth, let my name be upon your lips when you shed blood!"

traits.locale_text: [露出嗜血的微笑]“继续为我服务吧，死亡的舞者们。不过从今以后，每当你们挥洒鲜血的时候，要记得颂唱我的名字！”

languages.text: [血に飢えた笑みを浮かべる]「私に仕え続けろ、死の踊り子たち。だが今後、血を流すときは、私の名をその唇に刻め！」
languages.original_text: [Give a bloodthirsty smile] "Continue to serve me, dancers of death. But henceforth, let my name be upon your lips when you shed blood!"

traits.locale_text: [血に飢えた笑みを浮かべる]「私に仕え続けろ、死の踊り子たち。だが今後、血を流すときは、私の名をその唇に刻め！」

languages.text: [Blutrünstig grinsen] "Dient mir weiter, Tänzer des Todes. Doch lasst von nun an meinen Lippen auf Euren Lippen tanzen, wenn Ihr Blut vergießt!"
languages.original_text: [Give a bloodthirsty smile] "Continue to serve me, dancers of death. But henceforth, let my name be upon your lips when you shed blood!"

traits.locale_text: [Blutrünstig grinsen] "Dient mir weiter, Tänzer des Todes. Doch lasst von nun an meinen Lippen auf Euren Lippen tanzen, wenn Ihr Blut vergießt!"

languages.text: [Kana susamış bir şekilde gülümse] "Bana hizmet etmeye devam edin ey ölüm cambazları. Ancak bundan böyle kan dökerken ağzınızdan benim adım çıksın!"
languages.original_text: [Give a bloodthirsty smile] "Continue to serve me, dancers of death. But henceforth, let my name be upon your lips when you shed blood!"
